pageContext.claim: “So they now convict Roger Stone of lying and want to jail him for many years to come. Well, what about Crooked Hillary, Comey, Strzok, Page, McCabe, Brennan, Clapper, Shifty Schiff, Ohr & Nellie, Steele & all of the others, including even Mueller himself? Didn't they lie?”
pageContext.analysis: This is a false comparison. Stone, a longtime political associate of Trump's, was convicted of lying to investigators and obstructing Congress to protect Trump from allegations of Russian collusion in 2016. Trump routinely peddles false claims about the others on this list, but such claims do not prove criminality.
